external_games.name: VRC PRO GT3 chassis and components pack

name: VRC Pro: GT3 Chassis and Components
summary: DLC containing the 1:8 nitro onroad GT3 Modified chassis, wheels, rubber tires, 3.5cc .21 engine, exhaust pipe and the beautiful new P911 GT3 and the C7 body which come different paintschemes with 8 color schemes. The modified RS chassis has full setup options, ideal for the die-hard nitro on-road racer to tune the chassis to his liking.
